field.label: Enable Maltrail Sensor
field.help: This will activate the Sensor. Do not forget to enable the local server mode or send the logs to a remote server.

field.label: Capture All
field.help: This will look into all IPv4 and IPv6 traffic. If disabled it will only look for traffic for icmp, udp, tcp syn packets and on known HTTP ports.

field.label: Remote Server
field.help: IP address of the remote logging server.

field.label: Remote Port
field.help: Port of the logging server. Leave empty when sensor and server run on the same system.
